patthana16.55:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ rūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.55:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.55:2.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana16.55:2.1_2: adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
